channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15290] Hbase Rest CheckAndAPI should save other cells along with compared cell
item.description:
Java CheckAndPut API allows users to save Cells (C1..C5) while comparing a Cell C1.

But in Rest API, even though caller sent multiple cells, hbase rest code is ignoring all the cells except for compare cell.
item.summary: Hbase Rest CheckAndAPI should save other cells along with compared cell

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attached is the patch that has the fix for the bug.
Is it possible to add test so that there is no regression in the future ?
Added the unit tests and the patch is tested with the 1.1.3 RC tag on 1.1.1 branch. All are passing.

Hi Enis Soztutar Duo Xu Gaurav Kanade

Could you guys please review the patch?

Thanks,
Nitin.

239	    if(otherCells != null)

240	    {

The left curly should follow ')' on the same line as 'if' statement.
Patch looks good, except that we have to do this for checkAndDelete as well. Also, please follow the hbase style in the code (spaces in between arguments, left curly bracket, etc).
Enis, For CheckAndDelete, one can only delete the row right. Wondering why we need to consider all the put columns for check And Delete.

In Java API one can specify the Delete object which can contain (Delete a Cell / ColumnFamily / Row with a version etc). But when it comes to rest, were you suggesting the Body to contain the Cell's information that need to be deleted based on the last cell check? If none is present then delete the complete row
Addressed the { coding style comments

Yes, the Java API contract (as in Table.checkAndDelete) receives a Delete object, where the Delete() instance can be only for a row, cf or column. Just checked the code. I think there are at least two problems here:

  • RemoteHTable.checkAndDelete() does not send all the cells that is in the Delete to the REST API call. We can fix this here or some follow up jira since this is existing behavior.
  • RowResource.checkAndDelete() also does not honor the cells in the RowModel. Actually, it will only check and delete a single cell.
Enis, I would enhance CheckAndDelete as separate Jira as its is different api enhancement. Can we get this come completed?

Enis, I would enhance CheckAndDelete as separate Jira as its is different api enhancement. Can we get this come completed?

Fair enough. Please open a jira and link it here.

We should not add this header since it already exists. I can address it on commit. 


+ * Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

Let me kick a hadoopqa run.
CheckAndDelete & CheckAndPut are similar issues.
Linked and provided the patch for the CheckAndDelete also as another patch. Please get both of them in.
Reattach the patch for hadoopqa run.
Added release note.

-1 overall

I've committed this to 1.1+ since it is a bug fix. We were ignoring some cells that is sent with the request that we are not ignoring anymore, so I marked it as incompatible just to be on the safe side.

Thanks Ajith for the patch.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Fixed an issue in REST server checkAndPut operation where the remaining cells other than the to-be-checked column are also applied in the put operation .
